children.name: topRight
children.description: Gets the position of the top-right corner of the rectangle.

children.name: topLeft
children.description: Gets the position of the top-left corner of the rectangle.This is also the rectangle origin

parameters.name: value `kendo.geometry.Size|Array`
parameters.description: The new rectangle Size or equivalent [width, height] array.

children.name: setOrigin

parameters.name: value `kendo.geometry.Point|Array`
parameters.description: The new origin Point or equivalent [x, y] array.

children.description: Sets the origin (top-left point) of the rectangle.

children.name: getOrigin
children.description: Gets the origin (top-left point) of the rectangle.

children.name: equals
children.description: Compares this rectangle with another instance.

children.name: clone
children.description: Creates a new instance with the same origin and size.

children.name: center
children.description: Gets the position of the center of the rectangle.

children.name: bottomRight
children.description: Gets the position of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle.

children.name: bottomLeft
children.description: Gets the position of the bottom-left corner of the rectangle.This is also the rectangle origin

children.name: bbox
children.description: Returns the bounding box of this rectangle after applying thespecified transformation matrix.
